requests.name: Create Alpha Healthcare Case - Pune Blood Donation Drive
requests.description: Alpha team in Pune creates a case for blood donation drive

payload.title: Blood Donation Drive - Pune Medical College
payload.description: Organize a blood donation camp at Pune Medical College to support emergency blood requirements. Target: 200 units of blood. Duration: 2 days. Includes medical equipment, staff, and awareness materials.

requests.name: Create Beta Education Case - Delhi Autism School Admission
requests.description: Beta team in Delhi creates a case for autism school admissions

payload.title: Autism School Admission Support - Delhi
payload.description: Help 50 autistic children get admission in specialized schools across Delhi. Includes application support, documentation assistance, and follow-up with institutions.

requests.name: Create Alpha Healthcare Case - Mumbai Laser Treatment
requests.description: Alpha team creates case for laser treatment equipment in Mumbai

payload.title: Laser Treatment Equipment - Mumbai Remote Areas
payload.description: Provide laser treatment equipment for eye surgeries in remote areas of Mumbai. Equipment includes portable laser units, trained technicians, and 6-month operation support.

requests.name: Create Beta Education Case - Kolkata Books for Blind Schools
requests.description: Beta team creates case for books for blind schools in Kolkata

payload.title: Braille Books Distribution - Kolkata Blind Schools
payload.description: Distribute braille books and audio learning materials to 15 blind schools in Kolkata. Includes textbooks for grades 1-12, literary books, and digital audio devices.

requests.name: Create Alpha Healthcare Case - Chennai Vaccination Drive
requests.description: Alpha team creates vaccination drive case for Chennai

payload.title: Vaccination Drive - Chennai Rural Areas
payload.description: Conduct vaccination drives in rural areas around Chennai. Target: 5000 children and adults. Includes vaccines, medical staff, mobile clinics, and awareness campaigns.

requests.name: Create Beta Education Case - Pune Education Awareness
requests.description: Beta team creates education awareness case for Pune

payload.title: Higher Education Awareness Drive - Pune
payload.description: Awareness campaign for higher education options in rural Pune. Includes career counseling sessions, scholarship information, and college visit arrangements for 500 students.

requests.name: Create Alpha Healthcare Case - Bangalore Sports Charity Event
requests.description: Alpha team creates sports charity event for Bangalore

payload.title: Sports Charity Marathon - Bangalore
payload.description: Organize charity marathon in Bangalore to raise funds for medical equipment. Event includes professional timing, safety measures, participant kits, and medical support stations.

requests.name: Create Beta Education Case - Hyderabad Study Support
requests.description: Beta team creates study support case for failed students in Hyderabad

payload.title: Study Support for Failed Students - Hyderabad
payload.description: Provide counseling and study support for students who failed in board exams. Includes psychological counseling, remedial classes, and motivational workshops for 200 students.

requests.name: Create Alpha Healthcare Case - Jaipur Autism Therapy
requests.description: Alpha team creates autism therapy case for Jaipur

payload.title: Autism Therapy Program - Jaipur
payload.description: Establish autism therapy center in Jaipur with specialized therapists. Program includes speech therapy, occupational therapy, and behavioral intervention for 100 children.

requests.name: Create Beta Education Case - Ahmedabad Digital Learning
requests.description: Beta team creates digital learning case for Ahmedabad

payload.title: Digital Learning Initiative - Ahmedabad
payload.description: Provide tablets and digital learning content to government schools in Ahmedabad. Includes 500 tablets, educational apps, teacher training, and 1-year maintenance support.

requests.name: List All Cases - PMO Country View
requests.description: PMO user lists all cases across the country

requests.name: List Pune Cases - Finance User
requests.description: Finance user lists cases specific to Pune city

requests.name: List Alpha Cases - Alpha User
requests.description: Alpha user lists only Alpha team cases they can access

requests.name: Submit Case for Approval - Alpha User
requests.description: Alpha user submits their case for finance approval
requests.dependsOn: Create Alpha Healthcare Case - Pune Blood Donation Drive

requests.name: Finance Approve Case - Finance User
requests.description: Finance user approves a case submitted by Alpha team
requests.dependsOn: Submit Case for Approval - Alpha User

requests.name: PMO Final Approve Case - PMO User
requests.description: PMO user gives final approval to finance-approved case

requests.name: Attach File to Case - Alpha User
requests.description: Alpha user attaches a file to their case
requests.dependsOn: Create Alpha Healthcare Case - Pune Blood Donation Drive

requests.name: List Files for Case - PMO User
requests.description: PMO user lists all files attached to a case
requests.dependsOn: Create Alpha Healthcare Case - Pune Blood Donation Drive

requests.name: Reject Case - Finance User
requests.description: Finance user rejects a Beta team case
requests.dependsOn: Create Beta Education Case - Pune Education Awareness

requests.name: PMO Retrigger Rejected Case
requests.description: PMO user retriggers a rejected case back to finance
